meta.title: Your Bookings | Royal Transfer EU
meta.description: View and manage your Royal Transfer EU bookings.

error.networkError: Network connection failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.configError: Database configuration issue. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.
error.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
error.permissionError: Access denied. You do not have permission to view these bookings.
error.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again in a few moments.
error.noSession: No active session - please sign in again
error.emailLookupFailed: Could not determine user email for booking lookup
error.reloginMessage: Please sign in again to access your bookings.

toast.noUpcomingDesc: You don't have any upcoming bookings.
toast.noPastDesc: You don't have any past bookings.
toast.detailsErrorDesc: Could not load booking details. Please try again.
toast.linkSuccessDesc: This booking has been linked to your account.
toast.linkErrorDesc: Failed to link booking to your account.
toast.referenceCopiedDesc: Reference has been copied to clipboard

linkBooking.title: Link This Booking
